title: Duet Display for Mac/PC gets overhauled network protocol for big performance improvements
content:
Duet Display, the software-based solution to expand your Mac or PC screen with an iPad, iPhone, Android device, or even another Mac/PC is out its latest releases. Notably, the Mac update brings “significant wireless performance improvements” and more.

more…

The post Duet Display for Mac/PC gets overhauled network protocol for big performance improvements appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Duet Display, the software-based solution to expand your Mac or PC screen with an iPad, iPhone, Android device, or even another Mac/PC is out its latest releases. Notably, the Mac update brings “significant wireless performance improvements” and more. Duet Display is continuing to improve its experience for using iPad, iPhone, and more with Mac and […]
